form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Stabenow (for herself, Mr. Burr, Mr. Cochran, Mrs. Hagan, Mr. Heller, Mr. Nelson, Ms. Landrieu, Mr. Moran, Mrs. Shaheen, and Mr. Wicker) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To provide predictability and certainty in the tax law, create jobs, and encourage investment.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Motorsports Fairness and Permanency Act.

section.header: 7-year class life for motorsports entertainment complex facilities made permanent
section.text: Section 168(i)(15) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subparagraph (D).
